Section.Catchline: Duty to yield to public transit vehicles.

Subsection.Text: The driver of a vehicle shall yield the right-of-way to a publicly owned transit bus traveling in the same direction which has signaled and is reentering the traffic flow from a specifically designated pullout bay.
This section does not relieve the driver of a public transit bus from the duty to drive with due regard for the safety of all persons using the roadway.
